languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс удовлетворенно кивает, заметив вашу реакцию — точнее, ее отсутствие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс удовлетворенно кивает, заметив вашу реакцию — точнее, ее отсутсвие.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс удовлетворенно кивает, заметив вашу реакцию — точнее, ее отсутствие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nods contentedly, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hoche la tête avec satisfaction en remarquant votre réaction, ou plutôt, votre absence de réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hoche la tête avec satisfaction en remarquant votre réaction, ou plutôt, votre absence de réaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}看到你的反应之后，海因里希满意地点点头。或者说，他正希望你不要有任何反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}看到你的反应之后，海因里希满意地点点头。或者说，他正希望你不要有任何反应。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは満足そうにうなずき、あなたの反応に…いや、反応がないことに気付いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは満足そうにうなずき、あなたの反応に…いや、反応がないことに気付いた。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix nickt zufrieden, als er deine Reaktion bemerkt – oder besser gesagt das Fehlen einer Reaktion.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix nickt zufrieden und fällt auf, wie du reagierst – oder besser gesagt, dass du gar nicht reagierst.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix asiente satisfecho, habiendo advertido tu reacción; o más bien, la ausencia de una.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix asiente satisfecho, habiendo advertido tu reacción; o más bien, la ausencia de una.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Tepkini, daha doğrusu tepkisizliğini gören Heinrix, tatmin olmuş bir şekilde başını eğiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix nods with satisfaction, noticing your reaction — or rather, the lack of it.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tepkini gördükten sonra tatmin olmuş bir şekilde başını eğiyor. Tepkisizliğini daha doğrusu.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
